did.abstract: Letter from a woman named Anna, whose surname is not specified, in Oyster Bay, Long Island, N.Y. to her brother in Brooklyn, who is not addressed by name. The letter requests that Anna's brother provide assistance with her baggage upon her arrival from Hicksville. Dated 1849.
